title: Don't buy this for FM
body: Even if my house is just 5 km away from FM station, I didn't get any FM signal! So, FM is just a show piece in this speakerüòî. Sound quality is ok ok level. Make sure you hold this speaker in the right position (speaker upward position) while inserting the TF Card. Other wise it may damage the TF Card Slot. Bluetooth Connectivity is ok, no problem. Don't except high loudness. For a 100 sqft room, it is ok.

title: 'My new travel buddy'
body: 'I am using boat products and this one is just another good buy. Love that I can carry it to my vacations or parties. Fits in my purse. Decent sound quality loud enough for a 2BHK house. Amplifies if kept slightly enclosed as shown in my picture (kept in decorative bowl). Easy to connect with phone and easy to operate. Good buy overall! Value for money.'
